metadata.title: CVE-2019-15026 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
memcached 1.5.16, when UNIX sockets are used, has a stack-based bufferover-read in conn_to_str in memcached.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15026` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

memcached - 1.4.25-2ubuntu1.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: memcached package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.25-2ubuntu1.5').
